welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Bry-sur-Marne, known for its charming streets, rich history, and picturesque river. We invite you to discover the city's hidden gems and immerse yourself in its vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Le Bourget Airport caters to private and business aviation.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited access or speed.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and time restrictions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for budget airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
